name: domesticated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of animals or plants) brought under human control in order to provide food, power, or company: domesticated animals
able or willing to do cleaning, cooking, and other jobs in the home, and to take care of children: Since they had their baby they've both become quite domesticated.
